name: Brian

projects.title: My Kung Fu Flix - Angular Movie App
projects.description: A movie app built in Angular that allows the user to favorite different Kung Fu & Wuxia films, create a profile and see details ahout each film

projects.title: Pokedex
projects.description: A simple Pokedex app built with Javascript, AJAX & CSS that allows the user to sort through pokemon and see an image of their sprites as well as abilities & height information.

projects.title: Chat Application
projects.description: This is a chat app building using the Gifted Chat library and React-native, along with firestore for saving messages. Users can set their own color schemes, send images & recordings and take pictures all within the application.

projects.title: To-Do-list
projects.description: A simple JavaScript app that allows the user to create a to-do list, with the ability to check off completed tasks via a line-through or to remove them altogether

projects.title: Local Events App
projects.description: This is the client-side view of an "Events-by-city" React application, allowing users to create an account and search to access information about local events by city, including address, date, time & the ability to add them to a google calendar all within the application.

projects.title: My Kung Fu Flix - React Movie App
projects.description: This is the client-side view of the same Kung Fu Flix Movie App, built in react-redux, allowing users to create an account, access information about the genre, director & synopsis different films and save them to a personal list of favorites. Users are able to update their personal information and delete their account if desired. The API for this application can be found on the movie-api repo.

services.title: Fullstack Coding
services.description: Fullstack coding, including Javascript, React, React-Native, Angular, Node.js & MongoDB, Fireside/Firestore and more.

aboutpara:
My name is Brian Smawley! I was born in Tallahassee, Florida but raised in Atlanta, Georgia.
I was an Intelligence Analyst in the US Army & a Chef before completing the Fullstack Webdev course with Career Foundry. I have experience working with Angular & React, as well as other frameworks.

resume.description:
As a Fullstack Developer with a diverse work-background, I am seeking to work on creative projects and grow as a professional in an environment that values collaboration. My goal is to find a company in Berlin that encourages learning and provides opportunities for personal and professional growth. I am committed to using my wide range of skills to contribute to projects that make a positive impact on the world.
Work History:
8 years as an Intelligence Analyst in the US Army. 
10+ Years in Restaurants as a Head Chef, Marketing Manager & Floor Manager.
18 years of public speaking experience, event planning & event hosting.
Completed the Fullstack Developer Program with Career Foundry.

experiences.bullets: Angular, React, Node.JS, HTML, CSS, MongoDB, Mongoose, Postman, Redux
Self-Management of Time & Inventory, Attention to Detail, Improvisation

experiences.position: Head Chef & Marketing Manager @ Battle & Brew
experiences.bullets: Menu Design, Website Design,  Ad Campaign Creation, Image Editing, Food Photography, Budget, Content Creation
Statistic Tracking Models, Risk Analysis, Public Speaking, Briefing & Debriefing, Security Clearance Processing

education.universityPara: Associates Degree in Juvenile Justice & Cybercrime
